alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 15 at 1:57PM MDT until April 17 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Lighter totals of 1 to 2 inches for Potomac and Bonner. Watch for ice formation as snow melts on roads and refreezes. * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Marias Pass, Polebridge, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 9 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region
